channel.title: Quirlion - beta bot
channel.description:
So this is the bot Fusion89k and I have been working on for the past few months. It's not perfect yet but it has a nicely made scripting API and some cool features like model hook. And hey, it's something new.
Site: quirlion.com IRC: irc.rizon.net #quirlion Obligatory screenshot: [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/6hlzwy.png[/img]
Join the forums and help make them less pathetic. I think this bot, once improved, has a chance of beating or at least getting up there with RSBot/Kbot.

IRC Server is nao: irc.quirlion.com:6667 channel: #quirlion

Don’t forget to check out #chat!

item.title: Quirlion - beta bot
item.dc:creator: @Jython super_
item.description:
@Jython wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:82, topic:325678”][quote author=qauters link=topic=422085.msg3128564#msg3128564 date=1266237987]

SOME OF YOUR HOOK NAMES ARE SIMILAR TO MINE, THUS YOU RIPPED IT.

A quick look at the render/renderdata hooks shows that my hooks where used as inspiration, not that I give a shit however then also shut up when I use Kosaki’s hooks as a refference.

BY LOOKING AT OUTPUT THAT EVERY UPDATER HAS ALMOST I CAN SAFELY SAY IT COPIED MINE.

Tell me again who did all the work to figure out the hooks after runeteq5?

Everyone who fixed their updaters why.

Think again.

quarters gets sued so he becomes active at an old cheating community to try and revive broken ties with elitists so he can make even more money by stealing their ideas and work… again!

I don’t work on RSBot.
[/quote]

Let me make sure Jagex see’s that…[/quote]
sees that??

Read full topic

item.title: Quirlion - beta bot
item.dc:creator: @chri5 chri5
item.description:
@chri5 wrote:

[quote=“qauters, post:61, topic:325678”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=422085.msg3122725#msg3122725 date=1265689610]
and loll guess wut happened. Now for some mysterious reason rsbot has model clicking too! hmmmm…
[/quote]
If you would have taken a look at the DrawModel class, you would have seen:

//Draws a nice wire frame on interactable objects on screen.
//Thanks to Kosaki for his initial idea and part of this code:)

I’ve never looked at Quirlion, only reason I added it is because other bots started to have this feature.
Ps. I’ve looked at your updater output and seeing you just as well looked at my hooks,
I see no reason to blame me for taking a quick look at Kosaki’s one (of 40 revisions ago).

Sadly enough that was my last work on RSBot though :([/quote]
Chinese alter-ego lololol

Read full topic
